definition: to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: Let me make a modest proposal of what our life together might be like.
sentences.chinese: 讓我來小小的暢想一下你跟了我之後的生活。

sentences.english: To the melody of Moonlight Sonata of Beethoven.
sentences.chinese: 到貝多芬《月光奏鳴曲》旋律暢想。

sentences.english: Love is the start of baby talk.
sentences.chinese: 愛是開始暢想我們的寶貝。

sentences.english: Finally, mom, it’s time to start dreaming of her future.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對於母親而言，就是讓孩子暢想自己的未來。

sentences.english: The Olympic Games in 2008 is nothing more to me .
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，2008年的奧運還真沒有什麼好暢想的。

sentences.english: These small works like pets bring infinite beautiful reveries to people.
sentences.chinese: 這些好似寵物的小作品，帶給人們無限美好的暢想。

sentences.english: Think broadly about the contributions our nations have made to civilization.
sentences.chinese: 暢想一下我們兩國對文明所作的貢獻。

sentences.english: Here are some thoughts about the day you retire.
sentences.chinese: 以下是關於退休那天的一些暢想。
